query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Ma qui la morta poesì resurga, 8 o sante Muse, poi che vostro sono; 9 e qui Calïopè alquanto surga,
10 seguitando il mio canto con quel suono 11 di cui le Piche misere sentiro 12 lo colpo tal, che disperar perdono.
query.result:
**English:**
7 But here dead poetry shall rise again, 8 O holy Muses, since I am yours; 9 and here Calliope shall rise somewhat,
10 following my song with that sound 11 from which the wretched Magpies felt 12 such a blow that they despaired of pardon.
**Malay:**
7 Tetapi di sini puisi yang mati akan bangkit kembali, 8 Wahai para Muse yang suci, karena aku milik kalian; 9 dan di sini Calliope akan bangkit sedikit,
10 mengikuti nyanyianku dengan suara itu 11 dari mana Burung Magpie yang malang merasakan 12 pukulan sedemikian rupa sehingga mereka putus asa untuk diampuni.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Dolce color d’orïental zaffiro, 14 che s’accoglieva nel sereno aspetto 15 del mezzo, puro infino al primo giro,
16 a li occhi miei ricominciò diletto, 17 tosto ch’io usci’ fuor de l’aura morta 18 che m’avea contristati li occhi e ’l petto.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Sweet color of oriental sapphire, 14 which was gathered in the serene aspect 15 of the middle, pure up to the first circle,
16 began to delight my eyes again, 17 as soon as I emerged from the dead air 18 that had saddened my eyes and chest.
**Malay:**
13 Warna manis nilam oriental, 14 yang terkumpul dalam aspek yang tenang 15 di tengah, murni hingga putaran pertama,
16 mulai menyenangkan mataku lagi, 17 segera setelah aku keluar dari udara mati 18 yang telah menyedihkan mata dan dadaku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Lo bel pianeto che d’amar conforta 20 faceva tutto rider l’orïente, 21 velando i Pesci ch’erano in sua scorta.
query.result:
**English:**
19 The beautiful planet that comforts with love 20 was making all the east smile, 21 veiling the Pisces that were in its escort.
**Malay:**
19 Planet yang indah yang menghibur dengan cinta 20 membuat seluruh timur tersenyum, 21 menyelubungi Pisces yang berada dalam pengawalannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 I’ mi volsi a man destra, e puosi mente 23 a l’altro polo, e vidi quattro stelle 24 non viste mai fuor ch’a la prima gente.
query.result:
**English:**
22 I turned to the right, and fixed my mind 23 on the other pole, and saw four stars 24 never seen before except by the first people.
**Malay:**
22 Aku berpaling ke kanan, dan memusatkan pikiranku 23 pada kutub yang lain, dan melihat empat bintang 24 yang tidak pernah terlihat sebelumnya kecuali oleh manusia pertama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Goder pareva ’l ciel di lor fiammelle: 26 oh settentrïonal vedovo sito, 27 poi che privato se’ di mirar quelle!
28 Com’ io da loro sguardo fui partito, 29 un poco me volgendo a l ’altro polo, 30 là onde ’l Carro già era sparito,
31 vidi presso di me un veglio solo, 32 degno di tanta reverenza in vista, 33 che più non dee a padre alcun figliuolo.
query.result:
**English:**
25 The sky seemed to rejoice with their flames: 26 oh widowed northern region, 27 since you are deprived of gazing upon them!
28 As I departed from their sight, 29 turning a little toward the other pole, 30 where the Wain had already disappeared,
31 I saw near me an old man alone, 32 worthy of so much reverence in appearance, 33 that no son owes more to any father.
**Malay:**
25 Langit tampak bergembira dengan nyala api mereka: 26 oh wilayah utara yang janda, 27 karena kamu kehilangan kesempatan untuk memandang mereka!
28 Ketika aku meninggalkan pandangan mereka, 29 sedikit berbalik ke arah kutub yang lain, 30 di mana Biduk telah menghilang,
31 aku melihat di dekatku seorang lelaki tua sendirian, 32 layak untuk dihormati dalam penampilan, 33 yang tidak lebih dari yang seharusnya diberikan seorang anak kepada ayahnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Lunga la barba e di pel bianco mista 35 portava, a’ suoi capelli simigliante, 36 de’ quai cadeva al petto doppia lista.
query.result:
**English:**
34 Long was his beard and mingled with white hair, 35 like his hair, of which a double tress 36 fell on his breast.
**Malay:**
34 Panjang janggutnya dan bercampur dengan rambut putih 35 seperti rambutnya, yang mana jalinan ganda 36 jatuh di dadanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Li raggi de le quattro luci sante 38 fregiavan sì la sua faccia di lume, 39 ch’i’ ’l vedea come ’l sol fosse davante.
query.result:
**English:**
37 The rays of the four holy lights 38 so adorned her face with light, 39 that I saw her as if the sun were before me.
**Malay:**
37 Sinar dari empat cahaya suci 38 begitu menghiasi wajahnya dengan cahaya, 39 sehingga aku melihatnya seolah-olah matahari ada di depanku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 «Chi siete voi che contro al cieco fiume 41 fuggita avete la pregione etterna?», 42 diss’ el, movendo quelle oneste piume.
query.result:
**English:**
40 "Who are you who against the blind river 41 have fled from eternal prison?", 42 he said, moving those honest feathers.
**Malay:**
40 "Siapakah kamu yang melawan sungai yang buta 41 telah melarikan diri dari penjara abadi?", 42 katanya, sambil menggerakkan bulu-bulu yang jujur itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 «Chi v’ha guidati, o che vi fu lucerna, 44 uscendo fuor de la profonda notte 45 che sempre nera fa la valle inferna?
46 Son le leggi d’abisso così rotte? 47 o è mutato in ciel novo consiglio, 48 che, dannati, venite a le mie grotte?».
query.result:
**English:**
43 "Who has guided you, or who was your lantern, 44 coming out of the deep night 45 that always makes the infernal valley black?
46 Are the laws of the abyss so broken? 47 Or has a new counsel changed in heaven, 48 that you, damned souls, come to my caves?"
**Malay:**
43 "Siapa yang telah membimbing kalian, atau siapa yang menjadi lentera kalian, 44 keluar dari malam yang dalam 45 yang selalu membuat lembah neraka menjadi hitam?
46 Apakah hukum-hukum jurang begitu rusak? 47 Atau apakah suatu keputusan baru telah berubah di surga, 48 sehingga kalian, jiwa-jiwa terkutuk, datang ke gua-guaku?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Lo duca mio allor mi diè di piglio, 50 e con parole e con mani e con cenni 51 reverenti mi fé le gambe e ’l ciglio.
query.result:
**English:**
49 My guide then took hold of me, 50 and with words and hands and gestures 51 respectful he made my legs and brow move.
**Malay:**
49 Pemimpinku kemudian memegangku, 50 dan dengan kata-kata dan tangan dan isyarat 51 hormat dia membuat kakiku dan alisku bergerak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Poscia rispuose lui: «Da me non venni: 53 donna scese del ciel, per li cui prieghi 54 de la mia compagnia costui sovvenni.
query.result:
**English:**
52 Then he replied to him: "I did not come of myself: 53 a lady descended from heaven, at whose prayers 54 I came to the aid of this man in his company.
**Malay:**
52 Kemudian dia menjawab kepadanya: "Aku tidak datang dari diriku sendiri: 53 seorang wanita turun dari surga, yang atas permintaannya 54 aku datang untuk membantu orang ini dalam perjalanannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Ma da ch’è tuo voler che più si spieghi 56 di nostra condizion com’ ell’ è vera, 57 esser non puote il mio che a te si nieghi.
query.result:
**English:**
55 But since it is your wish that I explain more 56 about our true condition, 57 my wish cannot be denied to you.
**Malay:**
55 Tetapi karena keinginanmu agar aku menjelaskan lebih lanjut 56 tentang kondisi kita yang sebenarnya, 57 keinginanku tidak mungkin kutolak darimu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Questi non vide mai l’ultima sera; 59 ma per la sua follia le fu sì presso, 60 che molto poco tempo a volger era.
query.result:
**English:**
58 This one never saw the last evening; 59 but for his madness he came so close to it, 60 that there was very little time left to turn.
**Malay:**
58 Orang ini tidak pernah melihat senja terakhir; 59 tetapi karena kegilaannya dia begitu dekat dengannya, 60 sehingga hanya ada sedikit waktu tersisa untuk berbalik.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Sì com’ io dissi, fui mandato ad esso 62 per lui campare; e non lì era altra via 63 che questa per la quale i’ mi son messo.
query.result:
**English:**
61 As I said, I was sent to him 62 to save him; and there was no other way 63 than this on which I have set out.
**Malay:**
61 Seperti yang kukatakan, aku telah diutus kepadanya 62 untuk menyelamatkannya; dan tidak ada jalan lain 63 selain jalan yang telah kutempuh ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Mostrata ho lui tutta la gente ria; 65 e ora intendo mostrar quelli spirti 66 che purgan sé sotto la tua balìa.
query.result:
**English:**
64 I have shown him all the wicked people; 65 and now I intend to show him those spirits 66 who are purging themselves under your authority.
**Malay:**
64 Telah kutunjukkan kepadanya semua orang jahat; 65 dan sekarang aku bermaksud untuk menunjukkan kepadanya roh-roh itu 66 yang sedang mensucikan diri mereka di bawah kekuasaanmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Com’ io l’ho tratto, saria lungo a dirti; 68 de l’alto scende virtù che m’aiuta 69 conducerlo a vederti e a udirti.
query.result:
**English:**
67 How I rescued him would be long to tell; 68 from on high descends a power that aids me 69 to lead him to see you and to hear you.
**Malay:**
67 Bagaimana aku menyelamatkannya akan panjang untuk diceritakan; 68 dari tempat yang tinggi turunlah kekuatan yang membantuku 69 membawanya untuk melihatmu dan mendengarmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Or ti piaccia gradir la sua venuta: 71 libertà va cercando, ch’è sì cara, 72 come sa chi per lei vita rifiuta.
query.result:
**English:**
70 Now it pleases you to welcome his coming: 71 he goes seeking liberty, which is so dear, 72 as he knows who for it refuses life.
**Malay:**
70 Sekarang menyenangkan bagimu untuk menyambut kedatangannya: 71 ia pergi mencari kebebasan, yang sangat berharga, 72 sebagaimana diketahui oleh orang yang demi kebebasan itu menolak kehidupan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Tu ’l sai, ché non ti fu per lei amara 74 in Utica la morte, ove lasciasti 75 la vesta ch’al gran dì sarà sì chiara.
query.result:
**English:**
73 You know it, for death was not bitter to you 74 in Utica, where you left 75 the garment that on the great day will be so bright.
**Malay:**
73 Engkau tahu, karena kematian tidaklah pahit bagimu 74 di Utica, di mana engkau tinggalkan 75 pakaian yang pada hari besar akan begitu cemerlang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Non son li editti etterni per noi guasti, 77 ché questi vive e Minòs me non lega; 78 ma son del cerchio ove son li occhi casti
79 di Marzia tua, che ’n vista ancor ti priega, 80 o santo petto, che per tua la tegni: 81 per lo suo amore adunque a noi ti piega.
query.result:
**English:**
76 The eternal edicts are not broken for us, 77 because this one lives and Minos does not bind me; 78 but I am from the circle where the chaste eyes
79 of your Marcia, who still prays to you in her sight, 80 O holy breast, that you hold her as yours: 81 for her love, therefore, bend to us.
**Malay:**
76 Titah-titah abadi tidak dilanggar untuk kita, 77 karena yang ini hidup dan Minos tidak mengikatku; 78 tetapi aku dari kalangan di mana ada mata suci
79 Marcia-mu, yang masih berdoa kepadamu dalam pandangannya, 80 Wahai dada suci, bahwa engkau memegangnya sebagai milikmu: 81 oleh karena cintanya, maka tunduklah kepada kami.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Lasciane andar per li tuoi sette regni; 83 grazie riporterò di te a lei, 84 se d’esser mentovato là giù degni».
query.result:
**English:**
82 Let her go through your seven kingdoms; 83 I will report back to her about you, 84 if you are worthy of being mentioned down there.
**Malay:**
82 Biarkan dia pergi melalui tujuh kerajaanmu; 83 aku akan melaporkan kembali tentangmu kepadanya, 84 jika kamu layak untuk disebut-sebut di sana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 «Marzïa piacque tanto a li occhi miei 86 mentre ch’i’ fu’ di là», diss’ elli allora, 87 «che quante grazie volse da me, fei.
query.result:
**English:**
85 "Marzia pleased my eyes so much 86 while I was there," he said then, 87 "that I granted her every favor she asked of me.
**Malay:**
85 "Marzia sangat menyenangkan mataku 86 ketika aku berada di sana," katanya kemudian, 87 "sehingga setiap kebaikan yang diminta dariku, kulakukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Or che di là dal mal fiume dimora, 89 più muover non mi può, per quella legge 90 che fatta fu quando me n’usci’ fora.
query.result:
**English:**
88 Now that I dwell beyond the evil river, 89 I can move no more, because of that law 90 that was made when I exited from it.
**Malay:**
88 Sekarang setelah aku tinggal di seberang sungai yang jahat, 89 aku tidak dapat bergerak lagi, karena hukum itu 90 yang dibuat ketika aku keluar darinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Ma se donna del ciel ti move e regge, 92 come tu di’, non c’è mestier lusinghe: 93 bastisi ben che per lei mi richegge.
query.result:
**English:**
91 But if a lady from heaven moves and guides you, 92 as you say, there is no need for flattery: 93 it is enough for you to ask her for me.
**Malay:**
91 Tetapi jika wanita dari syurga menggerakkan dan menuntunmu, 92 seperti yang kaukatakan, tidak perlu ada pujian: 93 cukuplah bagimu untuk memintanya dariku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Questa isoletta intorno ad imo ad imo, 101 là giù colà dove la batte l’onda, 102 porta di giunchi sovra ’l molle limo:
103 null’ altra pianta che facesse fronda 104 o indurasse, vi puote aver vita, 105 però ch’a le percosse non seconda.
query.result:
**English:**
100 This little island around its base, down there 101 where the waves beat upon it, 102 bears rushes upon the soft mud:
103 no other plant that puts forth leaves 104 or becomes hard could have life there, 105 because it does not withstand the beatings.
**Malay:**
100 Pulau kecil ini di sekeliling dasarnya, di bawah sana 101 di sana di bawah tempat ombak menghantamnya, 102 ditumbuhi alang-alang di atas lumpur yang lembut:
103 tidak ada tanaman lain yang menumbuhkan daun 104 atau menjadi keras, dapat hidup di sana, 105 karena tidak tahan terhadap hantaman.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Poscia non sia di qua vostra reddita; 107 lo sol vi mosterrà, che surge omai, 108 prendere il monte a più lieve salita».
query.result:
**English:**
106 Afterwards, let your return not be this way; 107 the sun, which is now rising, will show you 108 to take the mountain by an easier ascent."
**Malay:**
106 Kemudian, janganlah kembali ke jalan ini; 107 matahari, yang sekarang terbit, akan menunjukkan kepada kalian 108 untuk mengambil gunung dengan pendakian yang lebih mudah."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Così sparì; e io sù mi levai 110 sanza parlare, e tutto mi ritrassi 111 al duca mio, e li occhi a lui drizzai.
query.result:
**English:**
109 Thus he disappeared; and I rose up 110 without speaking, and withdrew myself entirely 111 to my guide, and fixed my eyes on him.
**Malay:**
109 Demikianlah ia menghilang; dan aku bangkit 110 tanpa berbicara, dan menarik diriku sepenuhnya 111 kepada pemanduku, dan menatap matanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 El cominciò: «Figliuol, segui i miei passi: 113 volgianci in dietro, ché di qua dichina 114 questa pianura a’ suoi termini bassi».
query.result:
**English:**
112 He began: "Son, follow my steps: 113 turn back, for from here this plain slopes down 114 to its lowest depths."
**Malay:**
112 Ia memulai: "Anakku, ikuti langkah-langkahku: 113 berpalinglah ke belakang, karena dari sini dataran ini menurun 114 ke kedalaman terendahnya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 L’alba vinceva l’ora mattutina 116 che fuggia innanzi, sì che di lontano 117 conobbi il tremolar de la marina.
query.result:
**English:**
115 Dawn was conquering the morning hour 116 that was fleeing before it, so that from afar 117 I recognized the shimmering of the seashore.
**Malay:**
115 Fajar mengalahkan waktu pagi 116 yang melarikan diri di depannya, sehingga dari jauh 117 aku mengenali gemerlap pantai.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Noi andavam per lo solingo piano 119 com’ om che torna a la perduta strada, 120 che ’nfino ad essa li pare ire in vano.
query.result:
**English:**
118 We were going through the solitary plain 119 like someone who returns to the lost road, 120 who until he reaches it seems to be going in vain.
**Malay:**
118 Kami berjalan melalui dataran yang sunyi 119 seperti orang yang kembali ke jalan yang hilang, 120 yang sampai ia mencapainya tampaknya berjalan sia-sia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Quando noi fummo là ’ve la rugiada 122 pugna col sole, per essere in parte 123 dove, ad orezza, poco si dirada,
124 ambo le mani in su l’erbetta sparte 125 soavemente ’l mio maestro pose: 126 ond’ io, che fui accorto di sua arte,
127 porsi ver’ lui le guance lagrimose; 128 ivi mi fece tutto discoverto 129 quel color che l’inferno mi nascose.
query.result:
**English:**
121 When we were there where the dew 122 fights with the sun, to be in a place 123 where, in the breeze, it is slightly dispersed,
124 both his hands spread out on the grass 125 my master gently placed: 126 whereupon I, who was aware of his art,
127 turned my tearful cheeks toward him; 128 there he made me fully reveal 129 that color which Hell had hidden from me.
**Malay:**
121 Ketika kami berada di tempat embun 122 berjuang dengan matahari, untuk berada di tempat 123 di mana, dalam angin sepoi-sepoi, sedikit menghilang,
124 kedua tangannya terbentang di atas rumput 125 tuanku dengan lembut meletakkannya: 126 oleh karena itu aku, yang menyadari seninya,
127 menghadapkan pipiku yang berlinang air mata kepadanya; 128 di sana ia membuatku sepenuhnya menyingkapkan 129 warna yang disembunyikan Neraka dariku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Venimmo poi in sul lito diserto, 131 che mai non vide navicar sue acque 132 omo, che di tornar sia poscia esperto.
query.result:
**English:**
130 We then came to the deserted shore, 131 which never saw a man sail its waters 132 who was later skilled in returning.
**Malay:**
130 Kami kemudian sampai di pantai yang sunyi, 131 yang tidak pernah melihat manusia berlayar di perairannya 132 yang kemudian ahli dalam kembali.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Quivi mi cinse sì com’ altrui piacque: 134 oh maraviglia! ché qual elli scelse 135 l’umile pianta, cotal si rinacque
136 subitamente là onde l’avelse.
query.result:
**English:**
133 There it encircled me as it pleased another: 134 oh marvel! for as he chose 135 the humble plant, so it was reborn
136 suddenly from where he had taken it.
**Malay:**
133 Di sana ia mengelilingiku seperti yang diinginkan orang lain: 134 oh keajaiban! karena seperti ia memilih 135 tanaman yang rendah hati, begitulah ia terlahir kembali
136 tiba-tiba dari tempat ia mengambilnya.
